title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 218.6 - Action by superintendent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 218.6 - Action by superintendent

State Regulations
(a) The superintendent shall investigate each geographical redlining complaint and shall notify the complainant of the determination thereon. (b) The superintendent's statutory authority to investigate and hold hearings on possible violation of provisions of the Insurance Law is hereby incorporated in this Part. (c) Any insurer found by the superintendent to be in violation of section
3429, 3429-a, 3431 (a), or
3433
of the Insurance Law shall be considered to be engaged in unfair methods of competition and unfair or deceptive acts or practices, and shall be subject to the provisions of article 24 of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
218.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
